evidence.yaml_validation: All files parse without syntax errors

evidence.note: Foundational infrastructure PRD establishing new protocol components justified by failure modes FM-0001 through FM-0005

angles.assessment: Requirements are technically feasible. Ed25519 signing is well-established. OCAP context firewalls can be implemented with tool-level mediation. 30-second divergence watchdog polling is reasonable. N-run determinism envelopes are computationally tractable. No CAP theorem violations detected.

Customer segments (6) are well-defined with specific holon IDs and primary jobs. Problem statement addresses real adversarial surface (status spoofing). Failure modes (5) document concrete mechanisms with impact analysis and superior FAC mitigation rationale. Goals directly address stated problems.

Risks (7) are well-documented with likelihoods and mitigations. RSK-FAC-0004 (CI attestation gaps) acknowledges hosted CI limitations. Coordinated tradeoff analysis for STRICTNESS_VS_ADOPTION with graduated rollout phases. One MINOR implicit dependency on self-hosted runners noted in open questions.

PRD explicitly imports requirements from PRD-0004 (REQ-0009, REQ-0015, REQ-0025) rather than duplicating. Leverages existing kernel primitives (ledger, CAS, holonic execution) and CAC infrastructure (ContextPacks). Holon definitions extend existing APM2 architecture. No cousin abstractions detected.

All 5 requirements have detailed acceptance criteria with explicit verification methods. Evidence artifacts (21) define concrete test commands with expected outcomes. Metrics (13) have measurable targets with Wilson score intervals. Criteria are specific, bounded, and automatable.

Divergence watchdog provides automatic detection (<60s target). InterventionFreeze/Unfreeze path documented. Graduated rollout phases (FAC-R-01 through FAC-R-04) minimize adoption risk. Circuit breaker thresholds defined for provider errors. Emergency override ceremony documented via PRD-0007.

Default-deny security maintained throughout. 11 security controls documented. 6 security properties defined. Domain-separated Ed25519 signatures prevent cross-context reuse. OCAP containment with manifest allowlists. Ambient credential prohibition. Fail-closed on uncertainty. Data classification specified (INTERNAL). Comprehensive defect taxonomy (18 codes).

No contradictions between requirements. Phase 1/2/3 scoping is consistent across milestones and constraints. Feature flags (CI_EVENTS_ENABLED, CI_GATED_QUEUE_ENABLED) are consistently documented with fail-closed defaults. All non-goals explicitly clarify scope boundaries.

Explicit tradeoff cluster (STRICTNESS_VS_ADOPTION) with quantified thresholds and Pareto configurations. Criteria ranking with weights (Security 0.45, Velocity 0.30, Observability 0.15, Reversibility 0.10). Recommended configuration (CONFIG-FAC-GRADUATED) balances concerns. Not naive optimization - acknowledges velocity sacrifice for security.

Echo-trap detection (threshold=3, window=single GateRun) prevents reinforcing loops. Bounded retries (per_gate_max_attempts=3, global_max_episodes=50). Circuit breaker with TTL prevents thundering herd. Provider error classification with exponential backoff. Context refinement loop has explicit termination via ECHO_TRAP escalation.

findings.description: Q-FAC-0004 identifies that obtaining stable runner image digests from hosted CI may require self-hosted runners, but no explicit dependency on self-hosted runner infrastructure is declared in stakeholder_entities. This is acknowledged as an open question rather than a hidden assumption.
findings.remediation: Document self-hosted runner requirement as a Phase 1 infrastructure dependency in stakeholder_entities, or accept L0 attestation for hosted runners with explicit policy documentation (which is already outlined in RSK-FAC-0004 mitigations).

verdict_reason:
All 7 gates passed. 10/10 content review angles executed. 1 MINOR finding (implicit dependency on self-hosted runners acknowledged as open question with documented mitigations in RSK-FAC-0004). No BLOCKER or MAJOR findings. PRD demonstrates exceptional rigor:

- **Cryptographic hardening**: Ed25519 signatures with domain separation, lease-bound authority, OCAP context firewall
- **Complete traceability**: 5 local + 3 imported requirements, 21 evidence artifacts, 9 law alignments, zero orphans
- **Explicit adversarial surface analysis**: 5 failure modes with alternative intervention assessment and FAC superiority rationale
- **Quantified tradeoffs**: STRICTNESS_VS_ADOPTION cluster with Pareto configurations and graduated rollout
- **Verifiable acceptance criteria**: All requirements have concrete test commands and measurable metrics
- **Defense in depth**: 11 security controls, 6 security properties, fail-closed defaults
recommendations: Proceed to RFC conversion and implementation planning
Address MINOR finding by documenting self-hosted runner infrastructure dependency or finalizing L0 attestation policy
Consider formalizing the KeyPolicy artifact schema (referenced in Q-FAC-0003) during Phase 1 planning
Ensure GitHub branch protection contract (Q-FAC-0005) is codified in adapter handshake before Phase 1 deployment
